code: export var BASE_URL='https://auth.nomoreparties.co';export var register=function register(email,password){return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/signup"),{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({email:email,password:password})}).then(checkResponse);};export var authorize=function authorize(email,password){return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/signin"),{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({email:email,password:password})}).then(checkResponse).then(function(data){localStorage.setItem('jwt',data.token);return data;});};export var checkToken=function checkToken(token){return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/users/me"),{method:'GET',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json','Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(token)}}).then(checkResponse);};var checkResponse=function checkResponse(res){if(res.ok){return res.json();}return Promise.reject("\u041E\u0448\u0438\u0431\u043A\u0430 ".concat(res.status));};
